"Play Report": "Play Report is a system that summarizes each player's performance during a Quest, and shows which player attained the best result in each category."

"The Best Players tab shows the players with the best result in each category.

Your name will be displayed in yellow.

From here, you can send Good Jobs or Friend Requests to individual players, or to all players at once."

"The Personal Records tab displays your own results.

Any category for which you are the Best Player will be displayed in yellow."
